result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel T Sonnentag was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Encouraging Parole/Probation Violation, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.46.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Reminder Notice mailed to Defendant has been returned via USPS.  Return to Sender.  Deceased.  Unable to Forward.

ADDRESS INFO for Daniel T Sonnentag
Current: 301 S Brooklyn St  Apt 6, Berlin, WI 54923 United States  (Effective: 12-01-2015)
Prior: 301 Brooklyn St Apt 6, Berlin, WI 54923 United States

9:32 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant - has talked with the DA and will accept offer.  DA recites offer - upon plea to the charge, will recommend jail and costs.  Defendant concurs and makes statement by defendant.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.

Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of GUILTY.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1 as charged.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

2 days county jail, to commence within 60 days.
Court costs - Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

Court adjourned at 9:38 a.m.

ADDRESS INFO for Daniel T Sonnentag

Prior: 105 E Liberty St, Berlin, WI 54923
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant enters a plea of NOT GUILTY.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of:  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court will set for Status Hearing on October 13, 2015 at 9:15 a.m.  Defendant to make appointment with the District Attorney.

Court adjourned at 9:17 a.m.
